title: Las Letras
subtitle: The Letters
meta_desc: Learn about letters in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, las letras Spanish, letters Spanish kids

pages.title: Las Letras
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, colorful alphabet letters floating playfully in the air, A B C prominent.

pages.title: A es la primera.
